attributes.additional_details: The Den has taken many months and we have created many great memories. We built it for a place to chill at in summer and now it’s summer, it’s getting removed!
attributes.background: The council want to remove our Den that took months to build. Help us to make it stay

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions by your local council are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to submit a petition on this matter to your local council.
